Text:
Darth Tater i see you are suffering from xenophobia [You might need to look that one up in a dictionary....yes dictionary....its a book with lists of words in]

if all you have to say is to bitch about another persons language then what use are you to the human race?

please refrain from spouting off that diatribe of yours as it only makes you look very foolish indeed

Darth_tater, here's a good old Anglo-Saxon phrase for you: fuck you.  Recourse to your obviously much-consulted copy of the OED will confirm that the first word has one of the purest non-Latinate lineages of any in your vocabulary.

O, si quisieras, chinga su madre.  Idiot philistine.

As for the movie, I'm rooting for the latter alternative posed in the title.
I feel foolish having to address myself to someone who masquerades as 'darth_tater'.
